Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery ribbed vessel, the interior is spotted with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and faint traces of at least four lines of red-painted Coptic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394502) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394502)
